name: say
description: Make Catbox say something in a specified text channel.

arguments.name: channel
arguments.description: The channel to send the message in

arguments.name: message
arguments.description: The message to send

name: config
description: Customise attributes of the Catbox on the fly

arguments.name: attribute
arguments.description: The configuration attribute to change

arguments.name: value
arguments.description: The new value for the attribute

arguments.name: user
arguments.description: The user to retrieve info for

name: timestamp
description: Generate a timestamp based on the given date and time

arguments.name: year
arguments.description: Defaults to the current year in UTC time

arguments.name: month
arguments.description: Defaults to the current month in UTC time

arguments.name: day
arguments.description: Defaults to the current day in UTC time

arguments.name: hour
arguments.description: Defaults to the current hour in UTC time

arguments.name: minute
arguments.description: Defaults to the current minute in UTC time

arguments.name: timezone
arguments.description: Defaults to UTC (UTC-1, UTC, UTC+1, etc.)

arguments.name: format
arguments.description: (short/long)-time, (short/long)-date, (short/long)-date-time, or relative (default: short-date-time)

arguments.name: message
arguments.description: Include a message with your timestamp so others know what it's for

name: balance
description: Shows how many cats you have.

arguments.name: member
arguments.description: The member to check the balance of

name: spawn
description: Spawns cats out of thin air.

arguments.name: member
arguments.description: The member to spawn cats for

arguments.name: number
arguments.description: The number of cats to spawn

arguments.name: member
arguments.description: The member to give cats to

arguments.name: number
arguments.description: The number of cats to give

name: bet
description: Start a new betting round or join an existing one

arguments.name: amount
arguments.description: The amount of cats to bet

name: guess
description: Start a new guessing round or join an existing one, the user with the closest guess wins

arguments.name: number
arguments.description: Your guess number

name: check
description: Check how far off your guess is from the actual guess number

arguments.name: number
arguments.description: The number to check

name: eval
description: Run a piece of code via chat.

arguments.name: code
arguments.description: The code to run

arguments.name: string
arguments.description: Optional argument
